sourcesContent:
Subscribe To Updates
Welcome {{user}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthGuard } from '../../utility/app.guard'; import {KeycloakService } from 'keycloak-angular' @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { user:any="" isLoggedIn=true constructor(private KeycloakService:KeycloakService,private AuthGuard:AuthGuard) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.initializeUserOptions() this.userCheck() } private initializeUserOptions():void{ this.KeycloakService.loadUserProfile().then(res=>this.user=res.username) } login(){ this.KeycloakService.login() } logout():void{ this.KeycloakService.logout() this.KeycloakService.isLoggedIn().then(res=>this.isLoggedIn=true) } async userCheck(){ this.isLoggedIn=await this.KeycloakService.isLoggedIn() } }
